static member EndInvokeJS : Microsoft.JSInterop.JSRuntime * string -> unit

Docs.param: The serialized arguments for the callback completion.
Docs.summary: Receives notification that a call from .NET to JS has finished, marking the associated as completed.
Docs.remarks: All exceptions from are caught are delivered via JS interop to the JavaScript side when it requests confirmation, as the mechanism to call relies on using JS->.NET interop. This overload is meant for directly triggering completion callbacks for .NET -> JS operations without going through JS interop, so the callsite for this method is responsible for handling any possible exception generated from the arguments passed in as parameters.
Docs.exception: This method can throw any exception either from the argument received or as a result of executing any callback synchronously upon completion.
